{U}{B} STRANGE I want to believe, and with powerful Strange spells, you will too.

{R}{G} HOMESTEAD Use your bigger creatures to carve out a homestead and cast discounted spells.
{G}{W} HOMESTEAD Let many work and one and cast homestead spells with multiple creatures.
{W}{B} COUNTERS Life is hard on the frontier. Build your resilience with +1/+1 counters.
{B}{G} STRANGE Cryptic cryptids and mysterious monsters are your path to victory.
{G}{U} SIGHTINGS Chase half-seen visions of the strange and paranormal.
{U}{R} FOLKLORE Cast Folklore spells to remember the history of San Xalco
{R}{W} RANGERS Gather a posse and circle the wagons; your Ranger creatures will protect the settlement.

cards.rules_text: When Wilderness Explorer enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card with mana value X or less from among them and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Choose one or more —
• Exile target artifact.
• Exile target creature.
• Exile target enchantment.
• Exile target player’s graveyard.
Draw a card for each card type among permanents you control.

Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of noncreature spells you’ve cast this turn. You may exile a noncreature, nonland card with mana value X or less from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.

Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with mana value 3 or less. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. When you do, copy that spell. Put the other cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Whenever one or more counters are put on a creature you control, create that many Sighting tokens. Do this only once each turn. Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, counter that spell unless that player pays {X}, where X is the number of card types among cards in exile. This ability triggers only once each turn.
